comments:
Eclipse build 3.2M4

Attempting to run the platform with osgi.resolverMode=strict causes a failure in the org.eclipse.ui plugin as it attempts to access classes in the package org.eclipse.ui.internal.themes that is exported by the org.eclipse.ui.workbench plugin.  As a workaround, adding org.eclipse.ui as an x-friend to the org.eclipse.ui.internal.themes eliminates this error.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2006-01-03 13:11:55.294
!MESSAGE Could not create color factory.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.equinox.registry 4 1 2006-01-03 13:11:55.414
!MESSAGE Plug-in org.eclipse.ui was unable to load class org.eclipse.ui.internal.themes.RGBContrastFactory.
!STACK 0
